alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 2:12PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay and southern Washington Counties through 315 PM EST/215 PM CST/... At 211 PM EST/111 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles east of Santa Rosa Beach to 24 miles southwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Ebro, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Seminole Hills, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, Sunnyside, Porter Lake, Vicksburg, West Bay, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Magnolia Beach, Greenhead and Red Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
